root.name: No Heroes Allowed!
root.description: OverviewJust like the other two games in the series, "What Did I Do to Deserve This, My Lord?". You play a pick axe which is the God of Destruction and your job is to help Overlord Badman take over the world.Â You have to create a dungeon, hide Badman deep within and populate it with monsters in order to stop heroes from coming in and taking away badman. In this game they added in a new element to the game, Water. This helps create new monsters in the dungeon you create slowing down the heroes even more.
